A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I didn't think it was as good as the Force Awakens. 
We find out Rey just has "nobody" parents\, really after all the hype from the first one\, thats what we get?
Kylo kills Snoke with ease and we never get a background on him\, when Snoke should have been the main antagonist\, like the emperor was. 
Luke projects himself and just fades away after\, really that's what we get from the Master\, if felt like an injustice to him being killed off like that. According to Lucas\, Luke is the most powerful Jedi to ever exist\, and he just fades away...no force battle\, nor sabre battle...just sad.
The casino scene seemed pointless\, just there to give Finn something to do\, and the humor in the movie just didn't fit the scenes at times like it was just forced in.
I think Rian Johnson could have done this so much better. I was let down\, especially to all these builds ups we had from the Force Awakens.
